verbs.description: [ARG0: pet alligator] escapes [V: spooks] [ARG1: kansas neighborhood] before walking home heavy rains are likely to drive all sorts of critters to seek higher ground in kansas and missouri but not many would expect to see an alligator it happened monday night in basehor kansas when the large reptile stopped in the middle of a road kansas basehor natalie cowan
